name: Tales of Mahabharata
description: Tales of the Mahabharata is an RPG that takes you back into an age of gods and heroes. Journey through challenging levels and see the drama of history. Become an ancient Indian hero and earn favor with the different gods of India. Are you ready for one of the greatest wars of all time?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel i3 3rd Generation or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or better Processor: Intel i3 5th Generation or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
